A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: For new star wars fans I guess it might be ok but for the vast majority (fans who grew up on the original trilogy) it was very bad. To think your gona see 1 of your childhood heroes back again in a movie like this\, gona be a Jedi master & kick some ass & stuff but nope.... instead his character is made to dislike the Jedi & be a hermit\, no fighting or light saber battles. He uses the force once & dies. One positive thing is now I don't care about waiting for episode 9. What a huge disappointment this movie was. Shame on R Johnson for butchering Star Wars.
